name: Sad Boulders
overview: Sad Boulders, situated in a stunning natural setting, are renowned for their volcanic rock and a wide variety of bouldering problems. This location draws climbers from around the world due to its uniqueness and challenges. The optimal climbing season is during autumn and winter.

Sad Boulders, ubicados en un impresionante entorno natural, son famosos por su roca volcánica y una amplia variedad de problemas de búlder. Este lugar atrae a escaladores de todo el mundo debido a su singularidad y desafíos. La temporada óptima para escalar es el otoño e invierno.
